dict.string: SCRIPT: Get Last N Entries in Reverse Order fromn KME Log (SS)

# --- GET LAST N LINES IN REVERSE ORDER FROM LOG ---
read numLines tail -r -$numLines ~/"Library/Logs/Keyboard Maestro/Engine.log"

SCRIPT: Edit Macro by Name & Search for Action (AS)

property ptyScriptName : "Select Macro and Action By Name" property ptyScriptVer : "2.3" -- ADD Set KM Editor Search to actionName property ptyScriptDate : "2020-05-24" property ptyScriptAuthor : "JMichaelTX" tell application "System Events" set gCurrentApp to name of first application process whose frontmost is true end tell set macroName to my getKMVar("Local__Macro", "") set actionName to my getKMVar("Local__ActionName", "") try --=========== TRY ============== if (macroName ≠ "") then tell application "Keyboard Maestro" set oMacro to macro macroName editMacro macroName --if ((actionName ≠ "") and (actionName ≠ "Unknown")) then -- -- set actionList to actions of oMacro whose name is actionName -- -- if (actionList ≠ {}) then -- -- repeat with oAction in actionList -- -- tell oAction -- set disclosed to true -- end tell -- -- select oAction -- activate -- -- -- --set continueBool to my getAnswer(ptyScriptName, pPromptStr, pDefaultAnswerStr) -- -- set answer to button returned of ¬ -- (display alert ¬ -- "Locate Action with Error" message "Show Next Action with Name: " & return ¬ -- & actionName & ¬ -- "?" as critical buttons {"Stop", "Next"} default button 2) -- -- end repeat -- oAction -- -- else -- -- error "Could NOT find Action with Name of: " & linefeed & ¬ -- actionName & linefeed & linefeed & ¬ -- "in Macro: " & linefeed & ¬ -- macroName -- -- end if -- (actionList ≠ {}) --end if -- ((actionName ≠ "") and (actionName ≠ "Unknown")) end tell if ((actionName ≠ "") and (actionName ≠ "Unknown")) then --- Remove All Dashes "-" from Action Name --- -- (not allowed by KM Search tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" set actionName to search actionName for ¬ "-" replace "" regex false ¬ without case sensitive end tell tell application "System Events" tell application process "Keyboard Maestro" tell (first window whose title starts with "Keyboard Maestro Editor") tell text field 1 set focused to true set value to actionName end tell end tell end tell end tell end if -- ((actionName ≠ "") and (actionName ≠ "Unknown")) set scriptResults to "OK" else error "KM Variable 'Local__Macro' is empty/missing, so Macro can NOT be edited." end if --~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ --» ON ERROR --~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ on error errMsg number errNum if errNum = -128 then ## User Canceled set errMsg to "[USER_CANCELED]" end if set scriptResults to "[ERROR]" & linefeed & errMsg tell application gCurrentApp display notification errMsg ¬ with title (ptyScriptName & " " & ptyScriptVer) ¬ subtitle "[ERROR] Macro Cancelled" sound name "glass" end tell --» THROW ERROR ~~~~~~~ error scriptResults end try --======== END TRY ========== --––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––– return scriptResults --~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ on getAnswer(pTitleStr, pPromptStr, pDefaultAnswerStr) -- @Dialog @Answer local oAns tell application gCurrentApp set oAns to display dialog pPromptStr ¬ default answer pDefaultAnswerStr ¬ with title pTitleStr end tell return (text returned of oAns) end getAnswer --~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ --~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ on getKMVar(pKMVarNameStr, pDefaultValueStr) -- @KM @Get @Variable (* VER: 2.0 2019-08-10 --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- PURPOSE: Get Value of KM Variable & Set to Default if it doesn't exist PARAMETERS: • pKMVarNameStr | text | Keyboard Maestro Variable Name • pDefaultValueStr | text | Default value if Variable doesn't exist RETURNS: KM Var Value REQUIRES: Keyboard Maestro 8.0.3+ AUTHOR: JMichaelTX ————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————— *) local kmVarStr, kmInst set kmInst to system attribute "KMINSTANCE" tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" if ((pKMVarNameStr starts with "Local") or (pKMVarNameStr starts with "Instance")) then set kmVarStr to getvariable pKMVarNameStr instance kmInst else set kmVarStr to getvariable pKMVarNameStr end if end tell if (kmVarStr = "") then set kmVarStr to pDefaultValueStr return kmVarStr end getKMVar --~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ END OF handler getKMVar ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
